data.title: A Fowl Incident
data.meta_description: Picture of the Week. DDoS’ing Fosstodon. DDoS for Hire takedowns. TikTok Insanity. Illegal Warrantless Surveillance. Strategic Objective 3.3. GitHub Secret Scanning. CISA's
data.text:
Picture of the Week.

DDoS’ing Fosstodon.

DDoS for Hire takedowns.

TikTok Insanity.

Illegal Warrantless Surveillance.

Strategic Objective 3.3.

GitHub Secret Scanning.

CISA's Covert Red-Team.

What's left?

What's old is new again.

TCG TPM vulnerabilities.

WordPress “All In One SEO”.

Russia fines Wikipedia.

A Fowl Incident.

Show Notes: https://www.grc.com/sn/SN-913-Notes.pdf

Download or subscribe to this show at https://twit.tv/shows/security-now.

Get episodes ad-free with Club TWiT at https://twit.tv/clubtwit

You can submit a question to Security Now! at the GRC Feedback Page.

For 16kbps versions, transcripts, and notes (including fixes), visit Steve's site: grc.com, also the home of the best disk maintenance and recovery utility ever written Spinrite 6.
